## RadioBrowserApi.normalizeStations() method

Normalizes stations from the API response

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected normalizeStations(stations: StationResponse[], removeDuplicates?: boolean): Station[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  stations | [StationResponse](./radio-browser-api.stationresponse.md)<!-- -->\[\] | Array of station responses |
|  removeDuplicates | boolean | remove duplicate stations |
